pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchanti bāhuṃ olambentā …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:1.6: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchati bāhuṃ olambento, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
